name: Peas in a Pod
description:
The Apeacalypse is here! Your goal: warp to lightspeed and reach your new home planet, P-34, before it's too late! You've escaped your home planet in a space pod. Your pod has many rooms to keep your ship and your  crew healthy and happea.

  • The laboratory makes oxygen to keep your peas conscious. Make sure to keep your oxygen level as high as you can.
  • The kitchen makes food to keep your crew from from getting hungry and exhausted. Peas work harder on a full stomach!
  • Windows in the pod can be opened or closed to let sunlight and heat into the pod. Keep the pod's temperature at a  medium to avoid peas getting exhausted.
  • The crew quarters is where sleepy peas go to rest. A well rested pea is ready to be hard at work!
  • The weapons room defends your pod from asteroids. If your pod gets hit too much, your crew will rest in peas.
  • The generator room creates power for your pod. Full power is needed to get to P-34.
  • Fires and air leaks can be fixed with a pea wielding either a fire extinguisher or a welder's torch respectively.

You are now ready to command your crew. Click and drag on a pea to move them to assign them to a task. Good luck. Don't die out there.
